member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IBasicFloodChecker.IsFlooded
member.summary: Indicates where or not the current count has reached or exceeded the limit

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IBasicFloodChecker.UpdateCount
member.summary: Increases the current count of the FloodChecker by one

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IBasicFloodChecker.Reset
member.summary: Resets the count of the FloodChecker to zero

member.name: T:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IExpiringFloodChecker
member.summary: A FloodChecker which makes available the amount of time before the current count will expire, and the count return to zero

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IExpiringFloodChecker.TimeToExpiry
member.summary: The amount of time before the current count will expire, and the count return to zero. Null if there is no current value

member.name: T:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IFloodCheckerFactory`1
member.summary: Factory to construct and return a new floodchecker

member.name: T:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IGlobalFloodCheckerEventLogger
member.summary: Event logger for to log when a category of floodcheckers is accessed while the floodchecker is flooded.

member.name: T:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IRetryAfterFloodChecker
member.summary: Provides the number of seconds the caller must wait until they can send a request that will not be flood checked, if the caller is flooded.

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IRetryAfterFloodChecker.RetryAfter
member.summary: Returns the amount of time in seconds until the caller can send a request that will not be flood checked. Null if the caller is not flood checked.

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IFloodChecker.Check
member.summary: Returns the current state of the FloodChecker

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IFloodChecker.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the current count of the FloodChecker

member.name: M:Roblox.FloodCheckers.Core.IFloodChecker.GetCountOverLimit
member.summary: Gets the magnitude that count currently exceeds the limit. If the count is currently at or below the limit this will return zero.
